methods.name: RemoveFromParent
methods.comment: Make sure to call menu exit on our widgets

methods.name: SetActiveWidgetIndex
methods.comment: Activates the widget and makes it the active index.

methods.name: SetActiveWidget
methods.comment: Adding special case for null widget (ie, hide)

methods.name: WidgetMenuEnterDone
methods.comment: Called after menu enter animations has completed by our menu base child

methods.name: WidgetMenuExitDone
methods.comment: Called after menu exit animations has completed by our menu base child

methods.name: Internal_SetActiveWidgetIndex
methods.comment: Activates the widget and makes it the active index.

methods.name: Internal_SetActiveWidget
methods.comment: Set a active widget and clear all delegates

methods.name: IsDoingWidgetAnimation
methods.comment: Return true if we are currently animating in/out

methods.name: EnterAnimationTookToLong
methods.comment: Called if a childs Enter animation took too long. So we just skip it

methods.name: ExitAnimationTookToLong
methods.comment: Called if a childs Exit animation took too long. So we just skip it

properties.name: mPendingNewWidget
properties.comment: Pending widget that will be set when the animations is done

properties.name: mEnteringWidget
properties.comment: Widget currently running it's entering animation

properties.name: mExitingWidget
properties.comment: Widget currently running it's exiting animation
